data.actual_result: two or three messages go through despite cooldown
data.expected_result: only one message should have gone through as slowmode is enabled
data.short_description: using share feature you can send a message twice within a slowmode cooldown
data.steps_to_repro: - enter a channel with slowmode enabled, preferably one with a longer cooldown - open SMS or other app and share a message to discord. - click the channel with the slowdown enabled - click share multiple times rapidly - return to channel and observe
